casebody.data:
TRUSTEES OF WAKE TECH
v.
SLAUGHTER. No. 604P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2006.

Benjamin B. Slaughter, Pro Se.

Leanor D.B. Hodge, Raleigh, for Trustees of Wake Tech.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of December 2006 by Defendant to Amend Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of December 2006."
